tables.title: Street Encounters
tables.description: Quick street-level moments in a megacity saturated with chrome and crime.

entries.result: A netrunner advertises a pirate mesh upgrade, asking to piggyback on your rig.
Corporate security drones sweep the avenue; cameras lock onto any unregistered cyberware.
A data broker drops a burner shard in your pocket with a whispered, 'Call me.'
A street doc offers discount chrome installed in a back-alley van.
A protest blocks traffic with AR graffiti demanding open-source cyberware specs.
A courier on a hoverbike loses a satchel of unmarked credsticks mid-chase.
Gang lookouts scan the crowd with cheap optics, tagging anyone packing visible hardware.
Billboards glitch, revealing a banned manifesto before rebooting.
A fixer texts a time-sensitive gig: extract a VIP from a nightclub before dawn.
A swarm of delivery drones tangles, dropping packages labeled with rival corp seals.
A synth-pop idol darts through traffic, chased by fans and paparazzi mechs.
A blackout rolls down the block; only implanted eyes still glow in the dark.

tables.title: Databroker Leads
tables.description: Opportunities whispered through the mesh and back-room bars.

entries.result: Intercept a rival's drone convoy before it reaches the corporate tower.
Rescue a kidnapped coder forced to write black ICE.
Swap an executive's neural backup with a forged personality.
Sabotage a street gang's micro-reactor before it destabilizes the sector.
Plant a stealth node on a maglev train to siphon passenger biometrics.
Expose a mayor's secret corporate sponsorship before the election stream.
Hijack an orbital uplink window to broadcast a pirate signal.
Deliver an anonymous package to a sealed server farm with no cameras allowed.

tables.title: System Glitches
tables.description: Malfunctions and mishaps that complicate cyber operations.

entries.result: A security daemon reverts to a deprecated rule-set, flagging harmless traffic as hostile.
A burst of static fries disposable gear and jams comms for five minutes.
A ghost packet loops your last message, spamming allies and alerting watchers.
A rival netrunner piggybacks on your connection, copying fragments of your payload.
Firewall updates mid-run, sealing your exit nodes and forcing a new path.
A rogue AI fragment asks for help escaping, offering encrypted intel in return.
